DOC.brief_summary: Fibromyalgia Syndrome ( FS ) one condition affect functional performance , especially woman , due alteration entire musculoskeletal system . Given , Physical Therapy ( PT ) study human movement dysfunction , FS , complex chronic characteristic , impairs affect individual 's activity cause movement disorder , PT professional must part multidisciplinary team involve FS treatment . Nonetheless , explain present proposal , several aspect still need clarification relate PT role syndrome . Particularly , study analyze biomechanical , sensorial cardiorespiratory adaptation individual undergo PT intervention still lack ; study would contribute scientific evidence clinical practice . According recent systematic review , one use therapy positive effect FS subject hydrotherapy , combine exercise water relax effect . Other alternative treatment also search , attempt decrease painful picture present , FS etiology pathophysiology well know . The aim study evaluate efficacy different physical therapy resource FS , two subprojects . The first verify hydrotherapy effective modifying movement variable ( scapular kinematics electromyography ) autonomic modulation . Other variable , pain level quality life woman FS , also analyze . DOC.brief_title: Effects Hydrotherapy Physical Function Quality Life Women With Fibromyalgia
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects invite take part several assessment start actual Hydrotherapy Treatment . These assessment : 1 . Three-dimensional scapular evaluation 2 . Questionnaires ( FIQ , SF-36 , Beck Depression Inventory , Beck Anxiety Inventory , Pittsburgh Quality Sleep Index ) 3 . Pain ( pressure pain threshold trigger point ) Subjects evaluate 3 time one month start treatment , one time middle treatment treatment completion . Treatment last 16 week consist 2 weekly 45 ' hydrotherapy session .
